title: Stability AI previews Stable Diffusion 3 text-to-image model
description:
London-based AI lab Stability AI has announced an early preview of its new text-to-image model, Stable Diffusion 3. The advanced generative AI model aims to create high-quality images from text prompts with improved performance across several key areas. The announcement comes just days after Stability AI’s largest rival, OpenAI, unveiled Sora—a brand new AI model... Read more »

The post Stability AI previews Stable Diffusion 3 text-to-image model appeared first on AI News.
